## Goalkeeper

### Question:

- Which football team's goalkeeper has the best performance in Laliga in the season 2019 - 2020 ?

```{r}
goal_data <- La_liga_data %>%
  filter(Position == "Goalkeeper") %>%
  select(Team, Position, Games.played, Goals.conceded.while.player.on.pitch, Recoveries, Clearances) %>%
  rename("Game_played" = Games.played,
         "Goal_conceded" = Goals.conceded.while.player.on.pitch)

goal_data
```
